name: Legends of Runeterra
summary: Legends of Runeterra (abbreviated LoR) is an upcoming free-to-play online digital collectible card game developed and published by Riot Games. The game is scheduled to be released in 2020 following a series of private betas. Legends of Runeterra will exist in the same universe as Riot Games multiplayer online battle arena game League of Legends.
